document_data.title: Complete Adventurer
document_data.author: [[Jesse Decker]]
document_data.Contents:
* Introductions
* Chapter 1: Classes
* Chapter 2: Prestige Classes
* Chapter 3: Skills and Feats
* Chapter 4: Tools and Equipment
* Chapter 5: Spells
* Chapter 6: Organizations
document_data.Description: This accessory focuses on the skill based character classes, replacing and also expanding ''[[Song and Silence]]''. It presents additional base classes, prestige classes, and feats.
